headline.0: Compassion: Shifting The Balance From Bad to Good Stress

short_description.0: We generally think of stress as a big, bad, disease-causing, killer. Yet mother nature didn't give us the stress response to kill us. She gave us the stress response to help us stay alive!

authors.0:
James R. Doty, M.D., Contributor
